CheckTitle: Ensure no EC2 instances allow ingress from the internet to TCP port 3389 (RDP)
Description: This check ensures that no EC2 instances allow ingress from the internet to TCP port 3389 (RDP).
Risk: Exposing an EC2 directly to internet increases the attack surface and therefore the risk of compromise.

Recommendation.Text: Modify the security group associated with the EC2 instance to remove the rule that allows ingress from the internet to TCP port 3389 (RDP).
